video.title: Sonic Underground
video.synopsis: Trouble arises for Sonic the Hedgehog and his siblings when an oracle predicts they will overthrow an evil doctor and restore their mom to the throne.

episodes.synopsis: The history of the Underground is told, from the fall of Mobotropolis to the rise of Robotnik.
episodes.title: Beginnings

episodes.synopsis: The Hedgehogs begin to learn the important lessons of what it takes to be a freedom fighter. The Oracle provides teachers to guide them.
episodes.title: Getting to Know You

episodes.synopsis: Manic, Sonic and Sonia must end their training early when Robotnik threatens the Oracle and takes a member of the resistance hostage.
episodes.title: Harmony of Something

episodes.synopsis: Robotnik announces that he will marry Queen Aleena in a plot to become the king of Mobius.
episodes.title: Wedding Bell Blues

episodes.synopsis: Argus, a captain of the Queen's guard, is captured by Sleet and Dingo before he can reach the secret rendezvous where he was to meet Queen Aleena.
episodes.title: To Catch a Queen

episodes.synopsis: Sonic, Sonia and Manic return to their birthplace, but the homecoming is interrupted when Sleet and Dingo arrive to collect back taxes.
episodes.title: Mobodoon

episodes.synopsis: After being given a watch by her friend, Sonia discovers that these timepieces are really monitoring devices for the Robotnik Intelligence Agency.
episodes.title: The Price of Freedom

episodes.synopsis: Sleet and Dingo plan to collect the taxes owed to Robotnik from the Duke of Velcronia but keep it for themselves.
episodes.title: Underground Masquerade

episodes.synopsis: The sinister Robotnik blackmails Cyrus, an old friend of Sonic's, by holding his father hostage.
episodes.title: Tangled Webs

episodes.synopsis: On a trip to Port Mobius, Sonic, Manic and Sonia are told that ships are sinking due to the Mobian sea beast.
episodes.title: The Deepest Fear

episodes.synopsis: Queen Aleena's journals are rumored to be buried in the city of Tashistan. Sonic and his siblings scour the city in search of the scrolls.
episodes.title: Who Do You Think You Are

episodes.synopsis: While lost in the wastelands of Mobius, Sonic, Manic and Sonia stumble upon an oasis called Lake Valley Resort.
episodes.title: Last Resort

episodes.synopsis: Sonia is invited to a debutante ball, but before she can be officially announced to society, she and her brothers have an important mission.
episodes.title: Come Out Wherever You Are

episodes.synopsis: Robotnik organizes a track meet to lure Sonic into a trap. Robotnik is sure that Sonic will not sit out on a challenge of quickness.
episodes.title: Winner Fakes All

episodes.synopsis: The Hedgehogs receive a message that a castle is left to Sonia, who revels in the idea of having a castle for the Underground headquarters.
episodes.title: A Hedgehog's Home Is Her Castle

episodes.synopsis: The Hedgehogs steal historical artifacts of Mobuis from Robotnik before he can pawn them off at an auction.
episodes.title: Artifact

episodes.synopsis: A faction of the Freedom Fighters is wiped out by a swarm of metallic fly-bots. When Manic goes in search of the insects, he is stung with serum.
episodes.title: Bug

episodes.synopsis: A speed-enhancing fluid deemed Sonic Tonic is created by Robotnik to make him as fast as Sonic so that he may finally catch him.
episodes.title: Sonic Tonic

episodes.synopsis: The Hedgehogs converge on the Floating Island in their latest attempt to find their mother. But Sleet and Dingo also have an interest in this island.
episodes.title: Friend or Foe

episodes.synopsis: Sonic finds a message from his mother urging him to head to Speedster Island. When he and his siblings arrive, they encounter an ancient sanctuary.
episodes.title: Head Games

episodes.synopsis: Sonic becomes frustrated that maybe their efforts of fighting for freedom seem futile. Sonia suggests that they go to the Oracle for guidance.
episodes.title: When in Rome

episodes.synopsis: Robotnik has his sights set upon Queen Aleena's crown jewel, but Sonic, Manic and Sonia plan to recover the gem before Robotnik.
episodes.title: The Jewel of the Crown

episodes.synopsis: Sonic, Manic and Sonia find an abandoned baby in an alley and begin a search for the baby's parents. Manic grows particularly fond of the child.
episodes.title: Three Hedgehogs and a Baby

episodes.synopsis: Sonic and his siblings travel to the outskirts of Mobius to recruit a tribe of nomads for the Resistance.
episodes.title: Dunes Day

episodes.synopsis: Sonic, Manic and Sonia discover a book that contains directions to a scroll that could be an important tool to overthrow Robotnik.
episodes.title: Mummy, Dearest

episodes.synopsis: The Hedgehogs latest quest to find their mother takes them to the prison tower, where they encounter a masked stranger who insists he is family.
episodes.title: The Hedgehog in an Iron Mask

episodes.synopsis: The Oracle advises the Hedgehogs to undertake a mission that could reveal answers about their future.
episodes.title: Six Is a Crowd

episodes.synopsis: What is supposed to be a vacation for Sonic, Manic and Sonia turns into a battle to save Mobius when Robotnik attacks with his latest weapon.
episodes.title: Flying Fortress

episodes.synopsis: Sleet and Dingo escape the Flying Fortress with the Chaos Emerald, which they drop and break in two.
episodes.title: No Hedgehog is an Island

episodes.synopsis: Knuckles reluctantly makes a deal with Robotnik to turn over Sonic and his family in exchange for finding the Chaos Emerald that will save Mobius.
episodes.title: New Echidna in Town

episodes.synopsis: Queen Aleena advises the Hedgehogs to travel to a valley so that they can bring about peace between two contingents of the resistance that have split.
episodes.title: Country Crisis

episodes.synopsis: Robotnik is using the local hairdresser, Doo-bot, to get information on the citizens who are against him.
episodes.title: Haircraft in Space

episodes.synopsis: A self-proclaimed scientist has come to Robotropolis with a device that will reverse the effects of Robotnik's robotisizer.
episodes.title: Healer

episodes.synopsis: Robotnik has arranged a museum exhibit of the royal family goblets, which he expects will serve as perfect bait to finally capture the Hedgehogs.
episodes.title: Sonia's Choice

episodes.synopsis: The Hedgehogs' vacation is interrupted by the news of Robotnik's latest weapon. They must travel to the arctic where the weapon is located.
episodes.title: The Big Melt

episodes.synopsis: On a mission in a distant sector of Robotropolis, the Hedgehogs are informed that freedom fighters have disappeared and are going to be robotisized.
episodes.title: Sleepers

episodes.synopsis: Robotnik captures Bartleby and uses him as bait to capture Sonia. While the Hedgehogs are busy, Sonia slips away to aid her friend in need.
episodes.title: Bartleby the Prisoner

episodes.synopsis: Robotnik's new weapon, Art, is the enforcer of Robotropolis new eradication policy. Art's objective is to destroy everything in sight.
episodes.title: The ART of Destruction

episodes.synopsis: The newly discovered Emerald Peninsula is a perfect place for Robotnik to add slaves to his empire. The Hedgehogs turn to a fortune-teller for help.
episodes.title: The Pendant

episodes.synopsis: Sonic and Manic play a game of virtual reality to enhance their pilot skills.
episodes.title: Virtual Danger
